manageGoogleAccountPage.pageDescription: Connect and monitor your Google Business Profiles to maximize local visibility and SEO performance.
manageGoogleAccountPage.searchPlaceholder: Search accounts by name or email

emptyState.searchNoMatch: No accounts match "{searchTerm}". Try a different search term.
emptyState.addAccountCTA: Click 'Add New Account' to sync your Google Business Profile.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.accountDeleted: The Google account "{accountName}" has been successfully deleted.
deleteAccount.deleteFailed: Failed to delete the account. Please try again.
deleteAccount.successDesc: The Google account {{name}} has been successfully deleted.

refreshAccount.title: Account Refreshed
refreshAccount.updateFailed: Failed to update listing groups. Please try again.
refreshAccount.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh the account. Please try again.
